name: The Friendly Old Ghost
description:
This game was made for the New Mexico Game Jam 2015.
The theme was: "Death is only the end if you assume the story is about you"
http://nmgamejam.org

Play as a friendly ghost who wants to help trick-or-treating kids find their favorite candy. Scare them in the direction you want them to go, but watch out for zombie hands and ghosts which may scare them in the wrong direction!

Made in Unity 5.
